Name: Duff Gordon, Lucy Christiana, Lady
remarks: got on lifeboat 1, did not want to be separated from her husband, later estranged from him, escaped the sinking of the Lusitania by cancelling her trip

Name: Duff Gordon, Sir. Cosmo Edmund
remarks: got on lifeboat 1, rumoured to have bribed a sailor not to rescue more people

Name: Francatelli, Miss. Laura Mabel
remarks: secretary to Duff Gordon, Lucy Christiana, Lady

Name: Taylor, Mr. George/ James Taylor
remarks: signed on under a fake name of "James"
